name: Knight Academy Demo
description:
Seeking for excellence, a young squire dares to challenge the Knight Academy training grounds. Are you able to help her to overcome all the challenges?

How to win a puzzle? Make a check using the ammount of JUMPS that the puzzle said.

The young squire only move in "L" like the chess Knight.

Beta.

Game Designer: Felipe Lubambo

Game Developer: Pedro Paiva
